TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit NetworkProxy extends System.Object

MemberSignature.Value: public static PepperSharp.PPError GetProxyForURL (PepperSharp.Instance instance, string url);
.method public static hidebysig valuetype PepperSharp.PPError GetProxyForURL(class PepperSharp.Instance instance, string url) cil managed

Docs.param: An InstanceHandle identifying one instance of a module.
Docs.summary: Retrieves the proxy that will be used for the given URL. The result will be a string in PAC format. For more details about PAC format, please see http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Proxy_auto-config

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Threading.Tasks.Task<PepperSharp.NetworkProxy.ProxyInfo> GetProxyForURLAsync (PepperSharp.Instance instance, string url, PepperSharp.MessageLoop messageLoop = null);

.method public static hidebysig class System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1<class PepperSharp.NetworkProxy/ProxyInfo> GetProxyForURLAsync(class PepperSharp.Instance instance, string url, class PepperSharp.MessageLoop messageLoop) cil managed

Docs.param: An InstanceHandle identifying one instance of a module.
Optional MessageLoop instance used to run the command on.
Docs.summary: Retrieves the proxy that will be used for the given URL asynchronously. The result will be a string in PAC format. For more details about PAC format, please see http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Proxy_auto-config

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static class System.EventHandler`1<class PepperSharp.NetworkProxy/ProxyInfo> HandleProxyForUrl

Docs.summary: Event raised when the NetworkProxy issues GetProxyForURL.
